ca.nengo.ui.script

Class ScriptConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ca.nengo.ui.script.ScriptConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ScriptConsole
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A user interface panel for entering script commands.         Clears the command field

      • withinString

        public boolean withinString()
        Returns:
        True iff the user is currently typing a string literal (ie is between single or double quotes)

      • setInCallChainCompletionMode

        public void setInCallChainCompletionMode(boolean inMode)
        Parameters:
        inMode - Sets whether the console is in the mode of completing a call chain (otherwise it uses history completion)

      • getInCallChainCompletionMode

        public boolean getInCallChainCompletionMode()
        Returns:
        True if command completion is currently based on the call chain that the user is typing, false if completion is based on command history

      • enterCommand

        public void enterCommand(java.lang.String text)
        Parameters:
        text - Processes the current command in the command field

      • completorUp

        public void completorUp()
        Moves up the command completor list

      • completorDown

        public void completorDown()
        Moves down the command completor list

      • showToolTip

        public void showToolTip()

      • hideToolTip

        public void hideToolTip()

      • setTypedText

        public void setTypedText()
        Takes note of the text in the command field, as text that the user has typed (as opposed to recalled history). The two types must be distinguished, because we don't want an unselected history item to be used as the basis for subsequent history lookups.

      • revertToTypedText

        public void revertToTypedText()
        Resets command field text to the last text typed by the user (as opposed to autocompleted text).

      • getCallChain

        public static java.lang.String getCallChain(java.lang.String command)
        Parameters:
        command - A line of python code
        Returns:
        The segment at the end of the command that looks like a partial call chain, eg for command "y.getY(x.get" this method would return "x.get"

      • passKeyEvent

        public void passKeyEvent(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
